class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.Offering
class.comment: Table to store the offering information. Mapping file: mapping/core/Offering.hbm.xml

column.name: offeringId
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The identifier of the offering, gml:identifier. Used as parameter for queries. Unique

column.name: codespace
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the offering, gml:name. If available, displyed in the contents of the Capabilites. Optional

column.name: codespaceName
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:name codespace. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the offering, gml:description. Optional

column.name: disabled
column.comment: For later use by the SOS. Indicator if this offering should not be provided by the SOS.
